attributes.action: Encourage MPs to try living on £100 a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners are forced to live on approx £100 per week, for some sick and disabled its the same. Those unemployed and unemployable must live on £56 a week. I petition that MPs should, for a short period, at least attempt to live on this kind of income. See how they live by walking a mile in their shoes, then tell us that the benefits system is fair.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Encourage MPs to try living on £100 a week".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12434.asp

Prime Minister's Office
